News Article Geocoding

Mar 19, 2016

Abstract

This project aims to improve existing news article geocoding techniques in collaboration with the Cline Center for Democracy. We also intend to explore the challenges imposed by event-level instead of article-level geocoding and survey existing technologies and implementations.

People

  • Professor Robert J. Brunner, Department of Astronomy
  • Andrew Mehrmann, Department of Statistics
